H0.text: The 1999 film, 'The Green Mile' was directed by whom. Frank Darabont

H1.text: The 1999 film, 'The Green Mile' was directed by whom. Quentin Tarantino

H2.text: The 1999 film, 'The Green Mile' was directed by whom. Martin Scorsese

H3.text: The 1999 film, 'The Green Mile' was directed by whom. Ardeth Bey

A4.text: The Green Mile is a 1999 American fantasy drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont

A5.text: The film was shot at Warner Hollywood Studios, West Hollywood, California; and on location in Shelbyville, Tennessee; Blowing Rock, North Carolina; and the old Tennessee State Prison.
